cast.overview: When a straight-laced couple that has fun with a rowdy couple on vacation in Mexico return to the States, they discover that the crazy couple they met in Mexico followed them back home and decide to play tricks on them.
cast.title: Vacation Friends

details.biography: Luis Antonio was born in Colombia South America. Luis lived with his  grandparents until he was ten then he moved to the US to live with his  mother. As a child he took a keen interest in art and music but gave it  up to pursue a degree in Engineering. During his college years he worked  as a taxi cab driver, construction worker, dishwasher, computer  salesperson and building maintenance worker. He has always had an  interest in acting but really became passionate about it after taking  his first acting class at The Lisa Maile School. Since then he has taken  classes with Shauna Bartel, Rus Blackwell, Yvonne Suhor and Jennifer  Jarackas. He has appeared in numerous commercials and played various  roles in film and television.
details.name: Luis Antonio Howard
